discourse_list.title: The Schuppi and ElPro Delegate Happy Hour Featuring Greg DiPrisco of RWA Co!

content.content: The Delegate Happy Hour with our first ever featured non-delegate guest: @g_dip from RWA Co! As someone who still feels pretty lost on all this RWA stuff going on I was really looking forward to get someone like Greg on our Happy Hour - I learned a lot and I am pretty sure y’all will learn a lot as well by having a look at this weeks episode   01:50: the usual drink tasting   @ultraschuppi with an Erdinger white beer  @flipflopflapdelegate having a Macallan 12 years tripple cask   @g_dip bringing a Hillrock Rye making us all look like fools   10:00 How to (not) get into whiskey 13:30 Introduction of RWA Co. and its history 15:00 Why 120dB failed 16:45 Why HVB got help from RWA Co. and why Maker is an obviously great partner for them 20:00 How does it feel interacting with MakerDAO?  22:05 The good things 22:25 All other things     23:00 Accountability + Clarity what does Green Lighting even means 31:00 Should CoreUnits go against the will of MKR holders? 33:00 References to the Board of Directors, the SciFi novel by @rune and Decentralization 37:00 some more details on the recent events around HVB 42:00 how the HVB solution could be reused 44:00 the current pipeline of RWA Co!  enjoy!
content.GPT-summary: The post is about a Delegate Happy Hour featuring a guest from RWA Co. The author of the post is inviting readers to watch the episode and learn from it. The post also includes a brief summary of the topics discussed during the episode.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving positive feedback on proposal

content.content: This was a lot of fun. I hope I’ll be invited back!
for sure, we had a lot of fun with you  thanks for being with us!
I see the @rich.brown love in there.
